verses.text: FAKAFETA‘I kia Sihova, he ‘oku lelei ia; He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
Ko ‘Isileli ē, ke pehē ‘enau lea, “He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.”
Ko e fale ‘o ‘Ēlone, ke pehē ‘enau lea, “He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.”
Ha‘a ‘apasia kia Sihova, ke pehē ‘enau lea, “He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.”
‘I he‘eku ‘efitu‘ua na‘a ku ui kia IAA: Na‘e tali au ‘e IAA, ‘o ne ‘ai ki ha potu fu‘u ‘atā.
‘Oku kau ma‘aku ‘a Sihova; ‘oku ‘ikai te u ilifia: Ko e hā ‘e lava kiate au ‘e ha tangata?
‘Oku ‘iate au ‘a Sihova ke tokoni: Ko ia ‘e fakaai hoku loto ki he kakai ‘oku fehi‘a mai.
‘Oku lelei hake ke hūfanga kia Sihova ‘I he falala ki he tangata.
‘Oku lelei hake ke hūfanga kia Sihova ‘I he falala ki hou‘eiki mā‘olunga.
Na‘e kāpui au ‘e he ngaahi pule‘anga kotoa: Ka te u tu‘usi kinautolu ‘i he huafa ‘o Sihova.
Na‘a nau kāpui au; ‘io, na‘a nau kāpui au: Ka ‘i he huafa ‘o Sihova te u tu‘usi kinautolu.
Na‘e hangē ko e fanga pī ‘enau kāpui au; Na‘e hangē ha afi ‘akau talatala ‘a e tāmate‘i kinautolu; Ka ‘i he huafa ‘o Sihova te u tu‘usi kinautolu.
Na‘a ke mātu‘aki teke‘i au ke u hinga: Ka na‘e tokoni au ‘e Sihova.
Ko hoku ivi ‘a IAA, mo ‘eku hiva: Pea kuo ne hoko ko hoku fakamo‘ui‘anga.
‘Oku ‘i he ngaahi tēniti ‘o e angatonu ‘a e le‘o ‘o e mavava mo e ikuna: Ko e nima to‘omata‘u ‘o Sihova ‘oku fai kaukaua.
Ko e nima to‘omata‘u ‘o Sihova ‘oku mā‘olunga: Ko e nima to‘omata‘u ‘o Sihova ‘oku fai kaukaua.
‘E ‘ikai te u mate, ka te u mo‘ui atu; Pea ko e ngaahi fai ‘a Sihova te u ‘a‘au.
Ko hoku ngaohi ‘e IAA ko e me‘a kehe; Ka na‘e ‘ikai te ne tukuange ki he mate.
“To‘o kiate au ‘a e ngaahi matanikolo mā‘oni‘oni: Ka u hū ki ai, pea u fai kia IAA ‘eku fakafeta‘i.”
“Ko eni ‘a e matanikolo ‘o e ‘Eiki: Ko e mā‘oni‘oni te nau hū ki ai.”
Te u fakafeta‘i kiate koe, he kuo ke tali kita, Pea kuo ke hoko ko hoku fakamo‘ui‘anga.
Ko e maka ne fakatale‘i ‘e he kau tufunga Kuo hoko ‘o tuliki tau‘olunga.
Ko e me‘a mei he ‘Eiki ia, Pea fakaofo ki hotau mata.
Ko eni ‘a e ‘aho kuo fokotu‘u ‘e Sihova; Tau hākahaka ai mo fakafiefia.
“Tauange mo Sihova ke ne fakamo‘ui mu‘a!” “Tauange mo Sihova ke ne fakamonū‘ia!”
Ke monū‘ia si‘i ha‘u ‘i he huafa ‘o Sihova! “Kuo mau talamonū kiate kimoutolu ‘oku ‘i he fale ‘o Sihova.”
“Ko Sihova pē ‘a e ‘Otua.” “Pea kuo ne tuku ke hā mai ha maama.”
“Ko hoku ‘Ela koe, pea te u ‘atu ‘a e fakafeta‘i:” “Ko hoku ‘Elohimi koe, pea te u fai ho fakahīkihiki‘i.”
‘Ē, mou fakafeta‘i kia Sihova, he ‘oku lelei ia; He ‘oku tolonga ‘o ta‘engata ‘ene ‘alo‘ofa.
